product_name: Sea to Summit Ultra-Light Packcover - Extra Small
long_description: The Sea To Summit Ultra-Light packcover adds a bit of peace of mind with minimal weight. You never know when a hard rain is going to fall! Siliconized Cordura(R) nylon cover keeps your pack and, therefore, your clothes, sleeping bag and gear protected from the elements. Siliconized nylon is highly rip and tear resistant; the fibers stretch under pressure instead of locking together and tearing. Seamless construction for weathertight protection. Sea To Summit Ultra-Light packcover features a siliconized nylon mini stuff sack that attaches to packcover so it won't get lost.
short_description: The Sea To Summit Ultra-Light packcover adds a bit of peace of mind with minimal weight. You never know when a hard rain is going to fall!
